stoop.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to bend your body forward and down
stoop.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: We had to stoop to pass through the low entrance.
Dave stooped down to tie his shoes.
stoop.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to stand with your back and shoulders bent forwards
stoop.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: if you have a stoop, your shoulders are bent forward
stoop.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Mr Hamilton was an odd, quiet man who walked with a stoop.
stoop.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: a raised area at the door of a house, usually big enough to sit on
